PIN.values: |<-- This selects how deep we go to get the patch ID's for kontroleur|
|<-- Some global things to send to patches or configure|
|Midi is basic at the moment and only controls the current active patch|
|when we have multiple processes it can get confusing which patch your working on|

|time line&cr;&lf;double right click ->delete keyframe&cr;&lf;left click move&cr;&lf;single right click also makes the preset active so you cna see the values stored&cr;&lf;ctl+z undo shft control z redo&cr;&lf;shift + drag copy key frame (key is left where you hit shift, so if you drag before hitting shift, the keyframe will move from its original position)&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Keys&cr;&lf;left arrow back 5secs&cr;&lf;right arrow for 5secs&cr;&lf;up Loop&cr;&lf;Down Play&cr;&lf;Home goto start&cr;&lf;scroll up previous key&cr;&lf;scroll down next key&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Sliders&cr;&lf;LEft click to change value, right click to fine tune&cr;&lf;double right click to type entry&cr;&lf;to do, middle set to default value|

PIN.pinname: v4 version to open patch with

LINK.dstpinname: v4 version to open patch with
